mainContent.heading: What is the Comparison Table Section?
paragraphs: The Comparison Table Section allows you to display product features, pricing details, or specifications in a clear, side-by-side layout. It is designed to simplify decision-making by presenting key differences in an organized and easy-to-scan format.

This section works well for comparing multiple products, plans, or feature sets without cluttering your storefront. All content and styling can be adjusted to align with your brandâ€™s look and messaging.
